text: It’s in a module, but I am not sure how to pass in just the menu ID as a variable. when I get the code snippet for the menu it gives me the whole menu, nit just the id. Not sure if that makes sense?
<@U02JSM04NJJ> you need to add a menu field on the module, this field will output just that menu ID

<@U02JSM04NJJ> Ahh I see. So if you copy the snippet it gives you the whole menu, like you said. Lets say that snippet by default is `{% menu id="{{ module.menu_field }}" %}` You can just use the `{{module.menu_field}}`  as the id to pass into your manu function above
Oh haha. I don’t know how I missed that.
Hahaha happens to the best of us!
